tEHZrGiEChpNTQvvN.name: Eight-hour energy reserve, Refuel 3 times per day

m-BmWT3LyGuA4qDrb.name: Diffuse
m-BmWT3LyGuA4qDrb.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mV7_tTKIYtA90rklf.name: Homogenous
mV7_tTKIYtA90rklf.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mw_RcUhzdUAzd4wOP.name: No Blood
mw_RcUhzdUAzd4wOP.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mPR09hV3ZZwXcxO55.name: No Brain
mPR09hV3ZZwXcxO55.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mX2Vis1agJV0KGWkq.name: No Eyes
mX2Vis1agJV0KGWkq.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mk85D0YjxC1xUxtrM.name: No Head
mk85D0YjxC1xUxtrM.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

m_rlyWP4o4nA7T22y.name: No Neck
m_rlyWP4o4nA7T22y.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

m3QJAoen7unjDlceL.name: No Vitals
m3QJAoen7unjDlceL.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mYHwvH_CaObpPIEWw.name: Unliving
mYHwvH_CaObpPIEWw.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

tKCi9WsHZQZczqIUf.name: No fatigue points, Don't spend fatigue points

mtDaKUB8RqvZm0dLg.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

mqUI-UJ8vyKr4_L89.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

mPx-SBnjgThjo9QSk.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist
